name: WhattoweartodayOutfitIdeas
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what should i wear
des:
Did you ever ask your boyfriend, friend, best friend, mother or husband what to wear? Even though you know they can’t help you.

Now you can ask Alexa what to wear and she will give you one of over 100.000 combinations from the top of her head.

You don’t have something in the closet? Simply say “Alexa I don’t have a black top” and all combinations including "black top" will be removed.

If you don’t like the combination she picked for you, simply say “next” until she gives you an inspiration.

This application is not connected to the weather, it’s here to give you IDEAS for your style.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
